attributes.review: I tried to download the app but it took 4 whole weeks to download, then when it finally did it installed malware onto my device and made me get ads every time I tried to undownload it. I then got a strange text from a number saying that if I try to uninstall the app it'll kill my whole family and pin it on me?? I'm so confused and scared this app is trying to kill me omg omg omg 🙊
attributes.title: THIS APP IS TRASH

attributes.review: To all my fellow Trump supporters out there, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. I downloaded it to support our amazing President, but then I read an article that my cousin Becky put on her Facebook wall. THIS APP IS BEING USED BY THE LIBERAL SNOWFLAKES TO PRANK OUR PRESIDENT! They take the data and make into some kind of meme! They’re using it to get him kicked out of office! All my Trump 2020 people, do our great President a favor and DELETE THIS APP! Then give it ONE STAR! The Liberals will NOT ruin this country!!! 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app is AWFUL!!!! Not only did it slow down my phone, but the absolute drivel that this “app” is peddling gave me a VERY SEVERE case of eczema. My whole body is BRIGHT red. Ironically, when I put on my anti-itch cream, the red turned into a disgusting orange. I look like I’m covered in a cheap fake tan. Is this the goal?? What kind of brainwashing and bodysnatching GARBAGE is this CR”app” trying to indoctrinate upon us??? I DEMAND the removal of this treasonous dumpster fire of an “app” IMMEDIATELY.
attributes.title: ThisGaveMeEczema

attributes.review: When i got this app i expected to be able to get updates about the president!!!!! But the app suddenly started glitching and weird sounds would play. Next thing i new melatonin was at my door 🙀!!! She asked to see my phone but i refused, because of that she tied me up and threw me in her Lamborghini!!!! I dotnb knwo how im gnna get outa here,, sorrye ijfm still ihn the lambo 💔‼️ drlete this before other peopsle get kidnapped!!!1!
attributes.title: stuck in a lambo

attributes.review: This is the WORST app I have ever used in my entire life, crashes all the time, every headline is super biased and generally over all one the the worst experiences I’ve ever had in my life. This app causes my wife to leave me, my dog got hit by a train because of this app, and now I have IBS because of it too, y’all about a bad app, btw I’m gen z so take what you want from that if you are reading this review
attributes.title: THIS APP DUMPS 💩💩💩

attributes.review: I was crushed when it downloaded and then took 4 years to work. Then after I decided that I need to make sure everyone knows that this app is terrible and we can’t use this app for four more years. I hope everyone is able to realize that if were to continue using this app it would completely ruin the United States.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!

attributes.review:
I was really happy for the first day and I was really happy with that I could help the president, but the second day it had a really bad glitch which took all of my money in my bank account. I didn’t got my money  back yet and I don’t think I’m gonna get it back, also it deleted all of my pic and it went throw all of my folders and hacked my email.
DON’T RECOMMEND AT ALL!!!!😿😿🙀🤬😩
attributes.title: Shawty like a melody

attributes.review: To be honest, I expected more from a man who has millions of dollars at his disposal. This app constantly crashed and refused to function correctly when in the presence of my black friends. Although this app was really helpful at connecting me to the bigots and racists in my area, it did not send me a schedule for Klan meetings. Overall, this app is extremely unhelpful and a waste of phone storage.
attributes.title: Mediocre

attributes.review: NOTE: I am not part of the Gen Z. There is certainly nothing to do on this app. As a trump supporter, I want to know what my president is doing! This app however, only shows and tracks Biden’s work. Let’s also note that this app looks and presents itself as if a 7 year old designed it. I am embarrassed to be a Trump supporter and I am beyond ashamed to be affiliated to this app. Fix it, or you’ll lose a vote.
attributes.title: Trash
